articles.author: Katie Balevic
articles.title: Australian scientists discover plastic-eating fungi - Insider
articles.description: The fungi broke down plastics in 140 days in the "highest degradation rate reported" worldwide, researchers at the University of Sydney said.
articles.content:
Australian scientists say they have successfully found a way to use a backyard mold to break down stubborn plastics, showing potential for improving the low recycling rate for some plastics.
